attributes.action: Council Tax discount for single people is 25% & yet we use 50% less services
attributes.additional_details: A family with young children would have more waste, more need for emergency services, Schools - so single people are subsidising families.
attributes.background: Council Tax discount for single people is 25% & yet we use 50% less services, even more than a family of 4 or 5.  How is this fair? You are discriminating & penalising single people.
